## Sprint 5: V2 Room & Equipment Booking

**Duration**: 2 weeks  
**Priority**: Medium  
**Goal**: Enhanced room and equipment booking system

### Tasks

- [ ] **Room Booking Enhancements**
  - [ ] O365 calendar integration
  - [ ] Recurring bookings
  - [ ] Booking conflicts detection
  - [ ] Booking approval workflow (if needed)
  - [ ] Booking history

- [ ] **Equipment Booking**
  - [ ] Equipment catalog
  - [ ] Availability checking
  - [ ] Booking system
  - [ ] Equipment tracking
  - [ ] Return reminders

- [ ] **Calendar Integration**
  - [ ] Sync bookings to O365 calendar
  - [ ] Display bookings in calendar view
  - [ ] Calendar conflict warnings
  - [ ] Export to calendar

- [ ] **Notifications**
  - [ ] Booking confirmations
  - [ ] Reminder notifications
  - [ ] Conflict alerts
  - [ ] Cancellation notices

### Acceptance Criteria

- ✅ Rooms can be booked with O365 integration
- ✅ Equipment booking works smoothly
- ✅ Calendar syncs correctly
- ✅ Notifications are sent
- ✅ Conflicts are detected and prevented

### Dependencies

- V1 complete
- O365 calendar permissions
- Equipment inventory data

### Notes

This adds the room and equipment booking features that teachers requested.
